item.title: How do u make people admins and mods?
item.dc:creator: @omgthisisthe omgthisisthe
item.description:
@omgthisisthe wrote:

ok go to your server file and go to characters and find the male/girl you whant to make a admin or mod and find character rights and but 0 for normal person 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for owner and 4 for hidden mod hope i helped

item.title: How do u make people admins and mods?
item.dc:creator: @glennnn8 glennnn8
item.description:
@glennnn8 wrote:

try this…

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = Glennn8
character-password =

[CHARACTER]
character-height =
character-posx =
character-posy =
character-rights = 0 <---- 0 = normal player, 1 = p-mod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner
character-ismember =
character-messages =
character-lastconnection =
character-lastlogin =
character-energy =
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = [/code]

item.title: How do u make people admins and mods?
item.dc:creator: @tnt-hacker tnt-hacker
item.description:
@tnt-hacker wrote:

Go into your server files.
then you shoud find a map named characters.
Click on it.
Then u see all teh characters on the whole server.
Click on the character name u want admin/mod/co owner/owner
And look for “character-rights = 0”
In the folder.
When u have found it set the 0 into 1,2 or 3

1=mod
2=admin
3=owner/co owner

Hope i helped you

=)

credits me=)

Read full topic
